@@ -1845,6 +1845,92 @@ def func(A, b):
         _test_with_size(S, S + 1)
         _test_with_size(S, S - 1)
 
+    @unittest.skipIf(not TEST_MKL, "PyTorch is built without MKL support")
+    def test_fft_ifft_rfft_irfft(self):
+        def _test_complex(sizes, signal_ndim):
+            x = torch.randn(sizes, requires_grad=True, dtype=torch.double)
+
+            for normalized in (True, False):
+                def fft(x):
+                    return x.fft(signal_ndim, normalized=normalized)
+
+                gradcheck(fft, [x])
+                gradgradcheck(fft, [x], gen_non_contig_grad_outputs=True)
+
+                def ifft(fx):
+                    return fx.ifft(signal_ndim, normalized=normalized)
+
+                fx = fft(x).detach()
body: # Use output of fft(x) for inverse fft, due to symmetry requirements
body_html: Use output of fft(x) for inverse fft, due to symmetry requirements
body_text: Use output of fft(x) for inverse fft, due to symmetry requirements
